banner.title: Exclusive Investments. Curated for India’s Wealth Leaders.
banner.subtitle: Mandated inventory, tier-1 developers, and unbiased advisory built for long-term wealth creation.

heroSection.heading: Why MyFollo Stands Apart
heroSection.subtextone: Unlike most platforms, we don’t list everything. We curate. Every opportunity is pre-vetted, mandated, and backed by long-term thinking, not short-term sales.
heroSection.subtextTwo: Our approach blends discretion, trust, and premium expertise — ensuring that UHNI families, family offices, and corporates get access to opportunities that others don’t even see.

points.heading: Mandated Inventory Only
points.subText: No clutter, no mass listings — just handpicked deals.

banner.title: Sell, Lease, or Restructure Your Real Estate— With Confidence & Clarity.
banner.subtitle: We deliver structured, discreet, and data-led execution that protects your wealth while maximizing outcomes.

heroSection.heading: Why Transactions Fail Without the Right Partner
heroSection.subtextone: In India, most real estate deals are rushed, fragmented, or mispriced. For UHNI families, even small inefficiencies can result in massive opportunity loss. At MyFollo, we eliminate uncertainty by combining deep market intelligence with private, end-to-end execution — ensuring your assets are never undersold, overlooked, or mishandled.

points.heading: Who We Work with
points.subText: Designed for India’s Most Discerning Property Owners

feature.subText: Market analysis, profiling, and pricing intelligence.
Strategic marketing, discreet buyer/tenant outreach, and asset positioning.
Legal, negotiation, and closure managed seamlessly.

hightLightFeatures.heading: Transform into “Our Transaction Suite”
hightLightFeatures.text: End-to-end transaction management with dedicated deal teams. From initial sourcing to post-close optimization, we handle complexity so you can focus on strategy.

pointers.title: Exclusive Sale Advisory
pointers.text: Discreet, off-market positioning for premium assets. Our proprietary network connects you with qualified buyers before properties hit.

pointers.title: Lease & Asset Management
pointers.text: Maximize NOI through data-driven lease optimization. Our institutional-grade approach ensures every lease contributes.

pointers.title: Buyer & Tenant Profiling
pointers.text: Proprietary profiling system identifies and qualifies prospects before first contact. Reduce time-to-lease by 40% with pre-vetted.

pointers.title: Property Benchmarking
pointers.text: Institutional-grade analytics comparing your assets against market comps and portfolio peers. Make informed by real-time data.

pointers.title: Structured Negotiations & Closure
pointers.text: Orchestrated closings with military precision. From documentation to fund transfers, we eliminate surprises and deliver certainty.

pointers.title: Legal & Financial Due Diligence
pointers.text: White-glove legal and financial analysis protecting your interests. Our forensic approach uncovers risks before they become liabilities.

banner.title: The Family Office Advantage, Redefined
banner.subtitle: PREFO is India’s only pre-leased, family-office-led real estate framework designed to preserve and grow wealth with complete discretion.

heroSection.heading: What is PREFO?
heroSection.subtextTwo: More than real estate. A wealth framework.
heroSection.paragraph: Unlike equities or bonds, real estate portfolios are often unmanaged. Families and investors lack the strategic oversight and professional guidance needed to maximize value and minimize risk.”
heroSection.author: Founder & CEO

feature.subText: We assess your family’s goals, legacy ambitions, and risk appetite.
We curate pre-leased assets into a governance-ready portfolio.
We manage, monitor, and optimize for long-term stability and growth.

hightLightFeatures.heading: Who We Work With
hightLightFeatures.text: Serving Ultra High Net Worth Individuals across diverse profiles

pointers.title: Business Owners
pointers.text: Entrepreneurs who have built successful businesses and accumulated real estate holdings that need professional management.

pointers.title: Family Offices
pointers.text: Multi-generational wealth holders seeking specialized real estate portfolio advisory and execution services.

pointers.title: Returning NRIs
pointers.text: Global Indians managing property portfolios in India from abroad, requiring trusted, discrete oversight.

pointers.title: Multi-Gen Wealth
pointers.text: Families transitioning wealth across generations who need strategic structuring and compliance guidance.

banner.title: India's Only Real Estate Wealth Platform
banner.subtitle: At MyFollo, we help NRIs, UHNIs, HNIs, and family offices invest, manage, and grow their real estate portfolios with long-term intent and institutional discipline.

heroSection.heading: Our Origin Story
heroSection.subtextone: MyFollo was born from a simple observation: while India's wealthy had access to sophisticated investment platforms for stocks, bonds, and mutual funds, real estate—often their largest asset class—remained opaque, fragmented, and difficult to manage professionally.
heroSection.subtextTwo: MyFollo works on Aggregate, Control & Transact Model for real estate. The Landlord, Property owners & Developers are engaged online to aggregate inventory & then most efficient distribution channels are optimized to transact.

feature.subText: We assess your family’s goals, legacy ambitions, and risk appetite.
We curate pre-leased assets into a governance-ready portfolio.
We manage, monitor, and optimize for long-term stability and growth.

hightLightFeatures.heading: Build to Serve Legacy,
hightLightFeatures.text: Foundational pillars guide every decision, recommendation, and client interaction at MyFollo

pointers.title: Long-Term Thinking
pointers.text: We optimize for generational wealth, not quarterly gains. Every recommendation is evaluated through a 10-20 year lens.

pointers.title: Discretion
pointers.text: Privacy is paramount. Your portfolio details, investment strategies, and personal information remain completely confidential.

pointers.title: Expertise
pointers.text: Our team combines decades of real estate, finance, and technology expertise with deep local market knowledge across India.

pointers.title: Execution Excellence
pointers.text: From deal sourcing to post-investment management, we handle every detail with institutional precision and family office care.

pointers.title: Trust
pointers.text: Fee-only advisory model ensures our interests are perfectly aligned with yours. No commissions, no conflicts.

pointers.title: Result
pointers.text: A real estate portfolio that compounds wealth across generations with institutional rigor and family office personalization.

trustedLeaders.name: Amit Sharma
